overview: Steve is the President & Chief Operating Officer for Teledini. Prior to Teledini, Steve served as Chief Technology Officer for Global Connection Inc. of America, a CLEC operating in 30 states. Prior to Global, as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, Steve oversaw the strategic vision for Reignmaker Communications, driving the company’s steady growth as an industry leader in providing the highest quality VoIP for the small to medium business marketplace. Steve is an early pioneer in VoIP with more than a decade of front-line experience. He has a successful track record in creating solid growth companies. In 2000, he joined the founding team of Cbeyond Communications, Inc., a voice and broadband Internet provider for small businesses. At Cbeyond, he served in a variety of capacities including V.P. New Markets and V.P. of Sales Operations. In addition to developing the company’s core sales infrastructure, he grew the company’s direct sales force to an unprecedented 200+ installs per market/per month. Before his foray into VoIP, he served in a variety of leadership roles with Intermedia Communications, Inc. Steve also held sales leadership positions with PST, Inc., an authorized sales agent of MCI which was later acquired by MCI.
